title: Kristi McHugh Takes NYC
desc: Kristi McHugh Has a young fresh take on life. This Midwestern girls hysterical, yet clean comedy has taken her from the Laff Shack in Okoboji? (PRONOUNCED Oka-Bo_Gee) Iowa to the stages of Hollywood where she has shared the bill with: ? Geroge Wallace ? David Brenner ? Drew Carey? ? Arsenio Hall You may have seen her at: ? The Comic Strip Live in New York City ? The Hollywood Imrov ? The Ice House? Kristi has appeared in the blockbuster movies? DEUCE BIGALO MALE GIGOLO? with Rob Schneider, and Disney's? JACK OF ALL TRADES . Her television credits include,? WEST WING? and a starring role on the Discovery Channels? SCENE OF THE CRIME. Witness her quick wit and hilarious sponteneity on SPIKE TV's? I HATE MY JOB , and the upcoming? MORE KRISTI. PLEASE!
